text: Modulation of mRNA expression of a novel human myeloid-selective <extra_id_0> CCAAT/enhancer binding protein <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene ( <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) .

text: Human <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is a newly cloned gene coding for a <extra_id_0> CCAAT/enhancer binding protein <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> that may be involved in the regulation of myeloid differentiation .

Our studies showed that levels of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA were markedly increased in NB4 cells ( promyelocytic leukemia line ) , because they were induced by 9-cis retinoic acid ( 9-cis RA ) to differentiate towards granulocytes .

text: Accumulation of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA occurred as early as 1 hour after exposure of NB4 cells to 9-cis RA ( 5 x 10 ( -7 ) mol / L ) ; and at 48 hours , levels were increased by 5.1-fold .

text: Dose - response studies showed that 10 ( -7 ) to 10 ( -6 ) mol / L 9-cis RA ( 12 hours ) resulted in peak levels of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA ; but even 10 ( -10 ) mol / L 9-cis RA increased levels of these transcripts .

text: NB4 cells pulse-exposed ( 30 minutes ) to all-trans retinoic acid ( ATRA ) , washed , and cultured ( 3 days ) with either dimethylsulfoxide ( DMSO ) or hexamethylene bisacetamide ( HMBA ) had a prominent increase in levels of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA and an increase in granulocytic differentiation , but exposure to either DMSO or HMBA alone had no effect on base levels of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and did not induce differentiation .

text: Macrophage-differentiation of NB4 reduced levels of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA .
Nuclear run-off assays and half-life studies showed that accumulation of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA by 9-cis RA was due to enhanced transcription .

text: In contrast to the increase of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in 9-cis RA - mediated granulocytic differentiation , the DMSO - induced differentiation of HL-60 cells down the granulocytic pathway was associated with an initial reduction of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA levels .

text: In summary , we have discovered that expression of <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA is markedly enhanced as the NB4 promyelocytes are induced by retinoids to differentiate towards granulocytes .

text: We suspect that the <extra_id_0> C/EBP epsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter / enhancer contains a retinoic acid-response element that is directly stimulated by retinoids .
